Who We Are


What makes Ocelot an exceptional partner for your business and a great place to work?

Every company has a technology journey ahead of them. Whether you are looking to modernize existing platforms, migrate to cloud architectures, or design a completely custom solution from the ground up, Ocelot employs the absolute best engineers to turn your goals into reality.

Through our culture of learning and design excellence, our teams are always bringing cutting edge solutions forward while training each other and our clients on how to leverage the best tools for the right purpose. As a community, Ocelots across multiple organizations in the St. Louis area have created differentiating capabilities that are fine-tuned to our clientsâ€™ needs.
